cheat: Cheat - Chance at obtaining the correct answer.
getItem: Get item - Adds item found in room to backpack.
s: S - Displays the subjects you've taken.
multipleChoice: For multiple choice questions enter A, B, C, or D.
forTF: For True or False questions enter A, B, T, F, True or False.
multiple: For multiple choice questions enter A, B, C, or D.
save: Do you want to save before exiting? (yes/no)
caught: You have been caught and your answer is incorrect.
